source: TEXT_STMBDA133_02463_SEQ_00<tab>Pipin is looking forward to the assault on Castellum Velodyna.
target: TEXT_STMBDA133_02463_SEQ_00<tab>Pipin ist bereit, die Einzelheiten seines Vorhabens zu erklären.

source: TEXT_STMBDA133_02463_SEQ_01<tab>Mindful that intelligence is the key to any successful operation, Pipin would have you, Alphinaud, and Alisaie accompany him on a reconnaissance mission. Your destination is a cliff to the north of Castellum Velodyna, which should afford you an excellent view of the imperial installation.
target: TEXT_STMBDA133_02463_SEQ_01<tab>Die Eorzäische Allianz und die Be<var 16 /var>freiungs<var 16 /var>armee Ala Mhigos bereiten ihren Angriff auf Castellum Velodyna vor. Pipin, Alphinaud, Alisaie und du werden die Festung auf der Brücke noch einmal in Augenschein nehmen. Triff Pipin am verabredeten Beobachtungsposten.

source:
TEXT_STMBDA133_02463_SEQ_02<tab>Your mission is interrupted by the sound of cannon fire from the east. You turn to see a column of smoke on the horizon...rising from <var 1A 02 /var>Rhalgr's Reach<var 1A 01 /var>, you realize, with dawning horror. Alphinaud's attempts to contact your comrades via linkpearl are unsuccessful, all but confirming your suspicions that a coordinated attack is underway. With no other recourse, you abort your mission and race back to the Resistance stronghold.

Outside Rhalgr's Reach, you encounter a number of fleeing Resistance fighters, as well as Krile and Arenvald. They tell you of the chaos within the valley, of imperial soldiers cutting people down left and right, and of a last desperate stand by Conrad and the others. His face grim, Alphinaud declares your place is in the Reach, and so, joined by Krile, you press on into the bloodbath.
target: TEXT_STMBDA133_02463_SEQ_02<tab>Während ihr das Castellum in Augenschein nehmt, hört ihr Kanonen und seht eine Rauchsäule von Rhalgrs Wacht aufsteigen. Ihr eilt in das Versteck der Be<var 16 /var>freiungs<var 16 /var>armee und werdet Zeugen, wie die mhigischen Kämpfer von den Garlearn niedergemetzelt werden. Zenos yae Galvus führt den Angriff persönlich an<var 1D /var>- es sieht nicht gut aus für Conrad und seine Leute.

source:
TEXT_STMBDA133_02463_SEQ_03<tab>Aided by your comrades, you manage to beat back the imperial forces and reach your comrades. Lyse is unharmed, and Conrad merely unconscious, but Y'shtola is on the verge of death, her lifeblood pooling beneath her prostrate form. You turn to confront the man who dealt the blow: Zenos yae Galvus, the imperial viceroy himself. Lamenting the disappointment that was your comrades' performance, he raises his blade and bids you entertain him.

Though you endure Zenos's onslaught far longer than Pipin and Alisaie, even you are no match for him. With a flourish, the viceroy sends you flying─the only testament to your resilience the broken blade he flings to the earth as he turns his back on you and walks away. Raubahn and his Immortal Flames soon arrive, but he has seen enough death for one day, and orders his men to let the imperials withdraw and instead attend to the wounded.
target: TEXT_STMBDA133_02463_SEQ_03<tab>Es gelingt euch, verwundete Kämpfer zu retten, aber gegen Zenos' Schwert seid ihr machtlos. Der Kampf geht verloren. Sprich mit Raubahn, der zur Unterstützung aus Castrum Oriens herbeigeeilt ist.

source: TEXT_STMBDA133_02463_SEQ_04<tab>After taking in the carnage in silence, Raubahn reminds you that your actions saved lives, and that you should remember that, no matter what happens. Yet having come face-to-face with the crown prince himself, having seen the superhuman feats of which he is capable, you know exactly what it is that you will remember...
target: TEXT_STMBDA133_02463_SEQ_04<tab>Raubahn will sich noch nicht geschlagen geben. Aber zuerst müsst ihr euch um die Überlebenden kümmern.
TEXT_STMBDA133_02463_TODO_02<tab>Mit Raubahn in Rhalgrs Wacht sprechen

source: TEXT_STMBDA133_02463_STORMOFFICER_000_001<tab>For an operation of this import, we cannot afford to hold too many in reserve. Surely the Maelstrom must take part in this assault!
target: TEXT_STMBDA133_02463_STORMOFFICER_000_001<tab>Die Äxte des Mahlstroms sind gewetzt. Entern wir das Castellum!

source: TEXT_STMBDA133_02463_SERPENTOFFICER_000_005<tab>This will be our largest engagement yet. Our conjurers will do their utmost to provide support, but we must be prepared to suffer significant casualties.
target: TEXT_STMBDA133_02463_SERPENTOFFICER_000_005<tab>Wir stehen vor unserer größten Schlacht. Die Druiden haben die Ätherbeschaffenheit von Gyr Abania eingehend studiert, doch wir sollten uns auf Verluste vorbereiten.

source: TEXT_STMBDA133_02463_ALISAIE_000_010<tab>So Marshal Tarupin means to lead the reconnaissance mission himself, does he?
target: TEXT_STMBDA133_02463_ALISAIE_000_010<tab>Pipin leitet die Aufklärungsmission, nicht wahr? Bestimmt weiß er schon, wie man sich Castellum Velodyna am besten nähert.

source: TEXT_STMBDA133_02463_RAUBAHN_000_015<tab>Taking Velodyna will be the first significant step toward wresting Ala Mhigo from the Empire's grasp─but make no mistake: there will be many more such steps, each one taken at a cost.
target: TEXT_STMBDA133_02463_RAUBAHN_000_015<tab>Castellum Velodyna ist gut befestigt. Aber wenn wir Ala Mhigo befreien wollen, können wir uns nicht nur mit den einfachen Hindernissen abgeben. Wir müssen die schweren Brocken aus dem Weg räumen.

source: TEXT_STMBDA133_02463_ALPHINAUD_000_020<tab>A castellum is less a military installation and more a supply depot─a storage and distribution facility for the surrounding area. That being the case, taking it will not only earn us a strategic foothold, but deprive our enemy of valuable resources.
target: TEXT_STMBDA133_02463_ALPHINAUD_000_020<tab>Das Castellum ist nicht nur eine strategisch platzierte Wachfeste, sondern ein Versorgungslager für das gesamte Umland. Wenn wir es einnehmen, nehmen wir den Garlearn eine wichtige Nachschublinie.

source: TEXT_STMBDA133_02463_PIPIN_000_030<tab>Thank you for volunteering to join me. This should be a fairly straightforward reconnaissance mission, so long as we do not have the ill fortune to run afoul of an imperial patrol.
target: TEXT_STMBDA133_02463_PIPIN_000_030<tab>Wir werden uns dem Castellum auf Sichtweite nähern. Genauso wichtig wie eine sorgfältige Auskundschaftung ist es aber auch, dass wir nicht entdeckt werden. Wir wollen den Überraschungseffekt nicht verlieren.

source: TEXT_STMBDA133_02463_PIPIN_000_031<tab>Come─our destination is beyond East End, just north of Velodyna.
target: TEXT_STMBDA133_02463_PIPIN_000_031<tab>Ich habe bereits einen Beobachtungsposten ausgewählt. Kommt, folgt mir!

source: TEXT_STMBDA133_02463_ALISAIE_000_040<tab>Naught appears out of the ordinary at a glance...
target: TEXT_STMBDA133_02463_ALISAIE_000_040<tab>Alles still. Ein bisschen zu still für einen Stützpunkt.

source: TEXT_STMBDA133_02463_ALPHINAUD_000_045<tab>Even should they be unaware of our plans, I would be surprised if their western defenses were not heavily fortified, given the presence of Allied forces at the Wall.
target: TEXT_STMBDA133_02463_ALPHINAUD_000_045<tab>Das Castellum ist nach allen Seiten hin stark befestigt. Vielleicht müssen wir doch durch das Haupttor einfallen.

source: TEXT_STMBDA133_02463_PIPIN_000_050<tab>This ought to be close enough. Now we settle in for a long watch.
target: TEXT_STMBDA133_02463_PIPIN_000_050<tab>Von hier aus haben wir das Castellum gut im Blick. Behaltet ihr die Umgebung im Auge, während ich mir die Anlage mal durch das Fernrohr ansehe.

source: TEXT_STMBDA133_02463_PIPIN_000_051<tab>That said...it would be prudent to keep your weapons at the ready, in the event a passing patrol stumbles upon us, or worse...
target: TEXT_STMBDA133_02463_PIPIN_000_051<tab>Wäre doch gelacht, wenn ich nicht einen Schleichweg ins Castellum finde.

source: TEXT_STMBDA133_02463_SYSTEM_000_052<tab>Upon reconnoitering Castellum Velodyna, several cutscenes will play in sequence.
TEXT_STMBDA133_02463_SYSTEM_000_053<tab>It is recommended that you set aside sufficient time to view these scenes in their entirety.
target: TEXT_STMBDA133_02463_SYSTEM_000_053<tab>Bitte stell sicher, dass du genug Zeit hast, dir die folgenden Szenen anzusehen.

source: TEXT_STMBDA133_02463_ALPHINAUD_000_075<tab>Don't speak or try to move! Take slow, steady breaths, and remain calm...
TEXT_STMBDA133_02463_PIPIN_000_080<tab>Ugh... That is going to leave a mark.
target: TEXT_STMBDA133_02463_PIPIN_000_080<tab>Zenos hat drei von uns einfach so weggewischt, als wären wir Lehmfliegen<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_STMBDA133_02463_KRILE_000_090<tab>You're worried about Y'shtola, aren't you? <sigh> It's too early to make any kind of prognosis, but...she's alive. For now.
target: TEXT_STMBDA133_02463_KRILE_000_090<tab>Du machst dir Sorgen wegen Y'shtola, nicht wahr? Es ist zu früh für eine Diagnose, aber ihr Zustand ist stabil. Ich werde bei ihr bleiben und dafür sorgen, dass es auch so bleibt.

source:
TEXT_STMBDA133_02463_LYSE_000_095<tab>If it wasn't for her, it'd be me lying there...
<var 1A 02 /var>...I wish it was.<var 1A 01 /var>
TEXT_STMBDA133_02463_CONRAD_000_100<tab><pant> <pant> What about...what about the others? Where's M'naago? Where's Meffrid?
target: TEXT_STMBDA133_02463_CONRAD_000_100<tab><keuch> Wo sind die anderen? Wo ist M'naago? Und wo in Rhalgrs Namen ist Meffrid?

source: TEXT_STMBDA133_02463_RAUBAHN_000_110<tab>You did well, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. You saved lives. No matter what happens, remember that.
target: TEXT_STMBDA133_02463_RAUBAHN_000_110<tab>Wir haben die meisten Verwundeten in Sicherheit bringen können. Dank deiner tatkräftigen Hilfe.

source: TEXT_STMBDA133_02463_RAUBAHN_000_111<tab>Now then─let's do what we can for the wounded. Every minute counts!
target: TEXT_STMBDA133_02463_RAUBAHN_000_111<tab>Sieh, was du noch tun kannst. Jedes Leben zählt.

source: TEXT_STMBDA133_02463_WISCAR_000_113<tab>Godsdammit, Meffrid... Weren't you the one telling me to use my head and stay alive...
target: TEXT_STMBDA133_02463_WISCAR_000_113<tab>Er hat mir alles beigebracht, was ich wissen muss, um einen Schwertkampf zu überleben. Jetzt ist er selbst dem Schwert erlegen<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_STMBDA133_02463_QIB_001_TODO_1<tab>Aid the Resistance and find your comrades!

target: TEXT_STMBDA133_02463_HOSTAGE_BATTLETALK_001_001<tab>Die Garlear! Sie schlachten einfach alle ab!

source: TEXT_STMBDA133_02463_ALISAIE_BATTLETALK_001_002<tab>We have to stop them while there's still someone left to save!
target: TEXT_STMBDA133_02463_ALISAIE_BATTLETALK_001_002<tab>Hast du das gehört? Wir müssen sie aufhalten, bevor es zu spät ist!

source: TEXT_STMBDA133_02463_HOSTAGE_BATTLETALK_001_003<tab>The imperials came from nowhere...started cutting people down left and right...
target: TEXT_STMBDA133_02463_HOSTAGE_BATTLETALK_001_003<tab>Weiter vorne sind noch Kameraden. Sie sind dem Tod geweiht, wenn ihr ihnen nicht helft!

source:
TEXT_STMBDA133_02463_ALPHINAUD_BATTLETALK_001_004<tab>Reinforcements are on the way. Spread the word.
We should keep moving...
target: TEXT_STMBDA133_02463_ALPHINAUD_BATTLETALK_001_004<tab>Bring dich in Sicherheit. Verstärkung ist auf dem Weg.

source: TEXT_STMBDA133_02463_ALPHINAUD_BATTLETALK_001_005<tab>Confound it! Nothing for it but to fight.
target: TEXT_STMBDA133_02463_ALPHINAUD_BATTLETALK_001_005<tab>Wir müssen die Garlear in Schach halten. Sonst nimmt das Morden kein Ende.

source:
TEXT_STMBDA133_02463_KRILE_BATTLETALK_001_006<tab>Twelve forfend... It's a <var 1A 02 /var>bloodbath<var 1A 01 /var>...
Remember that we're here to save lives! Defend the hostages!
target: TEXT_STMBDA133_02463_KRILE_BATTLETALK_001_006<tab>Was für ein Blutbad! Bitte, es dürfen nicht noch mehr sterben!
TEXT_STMBDA133_02463_ALISAIE_BATTLETALK_002_002<tab>Diese Monster. Sie sind nur gekommen, um möglichst viel Blut zu vergießen.

source: TEXT_STMBDA133_02463_PIPIN_BATTLETALK_002_003<tab>It's not too late for the others. We must hurry!
target: TEXT_STMBDA133_02463_PIPIN_BATTLETALK_002_003<tab>Weiter! Wir müssen den Verletzten Zeit verschaffen!

source:
TEXT_STMBDA133_02463_ALPHINAUD_BATTLETALK_003_001<tab>What the─ Are those <var 1A 02 /var>beastmen<var 1A 01 /var> fighting for the imperials?
I've never seen them before...
target: TEXT_STMBDA133_02463_ALPHINAUD_BATTLETALK_003_001<tab>Hast du diese Wolfswesen gesehen? Was war das?

source: TEXT_STMBDA133_02463_KAIHOUGUN_BATTLETALK_003_002<tab>They...they took Lyse and the others deeper inside... You've...you've got...
target: TEXT_STMBDA133_02463_KAIHOUGUN_BATTLETALK_003_002<tab>Hauptmann Conrad wurde ge<var 16 /var>fangen<var 16 /var>ge<var 16 /var>nommen! Bitte helft ihm!

source: TEXT_STMBDA133_02463_KRILE_BATTLETALK_004_001<tab>There they are! We're not too late!
TEXT_STMBDA133_02463_FORDOLA_BATTLETALK_004_002<tab>Well, well. A rescue party, is it? We'll see about that.
target: TEXT_STMBDA133_02463_FORDOLA_BATTLETALK_004_002<tab>Diese Gefangenen werde ich Seiner Exzellenz zum Geschenk machen!

source: TEXT_STMBDA133_02463_FORDOLA_BATTLETALK_004_003<tab>Gah! Who in the seven hells are you!?
target: TEXT_STMBDA133_02463_FORDOLA_BATTLETALK_004_003<tab><var 1A 02 /var>Du<var 1A 01 /var> verstehst es zu kämpfen. Wer bist du?
TEXT_STMBDA133_02463_ALISAIE_BATTLETALK_DEAD<tab>Bitte nicht ... Nicht durch die Hand eines Garlears ...

source: TEXT_STMBDA133_02463_ALISAIE_BATTLETALK_005_001<tab>If we kill him, here and now, we can end this!
target: TEXT_STMBDA133_02463_ALISAIE_BATTLETALK_005_001<tab>Das ist unsere Chance, den Krieg zu gewinnen!

source: TEXT_STMBDA133_02463_ZENOS_BATTLETALK_105_002<tab>I have no need for this rabble.
TEXT_STMBDA133_02463_PIPIN_BATTLETALK_005_003<tab>Seven hells... Not even Father could do that...
target: TEXT_STMBDA133_02463_PIPIN_BATTLETALK_005_003<tab>Was war das? Gegen diesen Angriff haben wir keine Chance!

source: TEXT_STMBDA133_02463_ZENOS_BATTLETALK_106_001<tab>Hm. You yet stand. Mayhap you have potential.
target: TEXT_STMBDA133_02463_ZENOS_BATTLETALK_106_001<tab>Da steht ja immer noch jemand. Gut, dann spielen wir eben weiter.

source: TEXT_STMBDA133_02463_ZENOS_BATTLETALK_108_001<tab>It would seem I misjudged you. This ends now.
target: TEXT_STMBDA133_02463_ZENOS_BATTLETALK_108_001<tab>Ich beginne mich zu langweilen. Bringen wir es zu Ende.

source: TEXT_STMBDA133_02463_TEBBE_000_120<tab>Medicines, is it? Come on, come on, take what you need! I'm not about to be a stickler when there's lives to be saved!
target: TEXT_STMBDA133_02463_TEBBE_000_120<tab>Wir haben kaum noch medizinische Vorräte! Jeder Trank zählt!

source: TEXT_STMBDA133_02463_CARMA_000_121<tab>Valiantly did we fight, but ultimately for naught...
target: TEXT_STMBDA133_02463_CARMA_000_121<tab>Es waren zu viele ... Sie haben uns einfach überrannt ...

source: TEXT_STMBDA133_02463_AHELISSA_000_122<tab>What's done is done. The dead are dead. All I can do is feed the living and pray it helps them to grow stronger.
target: TEXT_STMBDA133_02463_AHELISSA_000_122<tab>Wir haben viele Lebensmittel verloren. Ich tue alles, was ich kann, um die Lücken zu füllen.

source: TEXT_STMBDA133_02463_RANULF_000_123<tab>Bastards paid no heed to whether or not the men they slaughtered were armed. Some of the sutlers... Damn it all!
TEXT_STMBDA133_02463_ORTWIN_000_124<tab>The imperials came from the Peaks. Somehow they knew about the tunnel...
target: TEXT_STMBDA133_02463_ORTWIN_000_124<tab>Sie sind von den Zinnen aus eingedrungen. Sie müssen die Projektion am Tunnelausgang durchschaut haben.

source: TEXT_STMBDA133_02463_MATHILD_000_125<tab>We came together as best we could, but in the end, there were just too many of them.
target: TEXT_STMBDA133_02463_MATHILD_000_125<tab>Sie haben tapfer gekämpft. Aber es war vergebens.

source: TEXT_STMBDA133_02463_ODILA_000_126<tab>I don't know... If we'd noticed sooner we could've used the cannons, but by the time we did, it was too late...
target: TEXT_STMBDA133_02463_ODILA_000_126<tab>Wir hatten nicht einmal Zeit, die Kanonen in Position zu bringen.

source: TEXT_STMBDA133_02463_DHANNA_000_127<tab>There will be a reckoning. Mark my words...
TEXT_STMBDA133_02463_ORELLA_000_128<tab>No time to talk. I must prepare more medicines.
target: TEXT_STMBDA133_02463_ORELLA_000_128<tab>Ich muss aufpassen, dass ich keine Zutaten verschwende. Jeder Trank zählt.

source: TEXT_STMBDA133_02463_EMMET_000_129<tab>I know there were spare bandages here somewhere...
target: TEXT_STMBDA133_02463_EMMET_000_129<tab>Wo ist das Verbandszeug? Haben wir keine Verbände mehr?

source: TEXT_STMBDA133_02463_BERINHARD_000_130<tab>Gah... In the heat of battle I barely felt the pain, but when the fighting died down, it was all I could do to stay standing...
target: TEXT_STMBDA133_02463_BERINHARD_000_130<tab>Während des Kampfes habe ich keine Schmerzen in meiner Schulter gespürt. Dafür jetzt umso mehr.

source: TEXT_STMBDA133_02463_HUGHOC_000_131<tab>Herbs for the poultices, herbs for the poultices...
